name: Farming Tracker
description:
Tracks item and currency changes on your account.
- Click on its menu icon at the top left of the gw2 screen to show the tracker window.
- This module uses DRF to track items and currencies. Instructions for setting up DRF can be found in the settings.
- Requires at least 'Window 8' because of WebSocket technology.
- The GW2 API is used too for various things like calculating the profit and getting item/currency icons and details. While DRF is very fast, the GW2 API may still delay the tracking by several seconds.
- Differences from session tracker module. Farming tracker: tracks much faster because of DRF; can track every item; can only track items and currencies and not custom stats (pvp/wvw stats, achievement values, ...); can not track total counts on account.
